parameters.content:
# üéØ Latihan 1: Hello World MCP

## Objective
Buat endpoint sederhana yang menerima nama dan mengembalikan greeting dalam format MCP standar.

## How to Test

### 1. Start Test Mode
Klik "Test workflow" di atas

### 2. Send Request (PowerShell)
```powershell
$body = @{ name = "Ahmad" } | ConvertTo-Json
Invoke-RestMethod -Uri "http://localhost:5678/webhook-test/mcp-hello" -Method POST -Body $body -ContentType "application/json"
```

### 3. Expected Response
```json
{
  "success": true,
  "message": "Hello, Ahmad! üëã MCP is working perfectly.",
  "metadata": {
    "tool": "mcp-hello",
    "version": "1.0.0"
  }
}
```

## ‚úÖ Success Criteria
- [ ] Response status 200
- [ ] Response berisi "success": true
- [ ] Nama dari input muncul di message

## üìä MCP Response Format

```
{
  "success": boolean,
  "message": string,
  "metadata": {
    "tool": string,
    "version": string,
    "processedAt": ISO timestamp
  },
  "data": any (optional)
}
```

Format ini adalah standar yang akan kita pakai di semua latihan MCP.

---

**Architect Note:**
Selalu sertakan metadata untuk:
- Debugging
- Audit logging
- Performance tracking
